OK, found it, I must've been sleeping when I read your reply.

Serpentor jumped back from Lunaprine's slash at his chest and laughed as he
slashed at his weapon with his claws.  He brought his sword up to block the
claws and fired an optic blast at Luna's chest.

OK never mind the kick then.

Lunarpine howled in pain as the optics forced him backward, cutting into his
chest. "Now that I've seen what you're capable of I've got a few surprises
of my own to show you". He transformed to his half wolf form to begin
repairs. he'd lost enough mech fluid from the initial wound to slow him
down. Now the wolfbot had wounds in the robotic chest to worry about. His
half transformation would slow the effects of the injuries but he still
fealt them. The large werewolf looking Lunarpine opened his mouth and
launched a sonic howl at Serpentor. The attack wasn't designed to do a lot
of physical damage but it could reak havoc on the targets audio receptors.
